lead_paragraph: President Evo Morales said that exit polls indicating the failure of a referendum to allow him to run for a fourth term in fact showed a statistical tie as a final count continued.

headline.print_headline: Polls Show Bolivian Leader Losing Vote, but He Sees Tie
headline.main: Polls Show Bolivian Leader Losing Vote, but He Sees Tie

snippet: President Evo Morales said that exit polls indicating the failure of a referendum to allow him to run for a fourth term in fact showed a statistical tie as a final count continued.
abstract: Bolivian Pres Evo Morales insists apparently failed referendum on constitutional change that would allow him to remain president until 2025 may still come out in his favor; country's first indigenous leader introduced popular quasi-socialist programs, but has endured scandals and increasing criticism.
